titleStmt.title: [A new-fashioned marigold.] Or, a dainty new-fashion devised for Tom Stitch the tailor

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, and J. Clarke,

notesStmt.note: Bracketed portion of title from MS. inscription on O copy.
Verse - "There was a young man in his prime,".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
